name: sass-semver
author: Hugo Giraudel
description: A lightweight semantic version parser in Sass.

scripts.generate-doc: sassdoc src/index.scss sassdoc/ --verbose --config=.sassdocrc && echo 'Documentation successfully generated in sassdoc/index.html'
scripts.deploy-doc: git add sassdoc/ && git commit -m 'Compile SassDoc' --allow-empty && git subtree push --prefix sassdoc origin gh-pages && echo 'Documentation successfully deployed to http://hugogiraudel.github.io/sass-semver/'
